job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We need your help to build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. You can build web applications autonomously from scratch. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
   Practical examples
     * Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
     * Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
     * Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
     * Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.

   Facts & figures
     * 36 or 40 hours a week.
     * Mostly greenfield, limited legacy work.
     * 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.

   Top responsibilities
     * Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
     * Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
     * Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
job_details.full_text:
Rabobank - Junior Full Stack Engineer

We need your help to build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. You can build web applications autonomously from scratch. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
   Practical examples
     * Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
     * Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
     * Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
     * Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.

   Facts & figures
     * 36 or 40 hours a week.
     * Mostly greenfield, limited legacy work.
     * 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.

   Top responsibilities
     * Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
     * Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
     * Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and running 'groundbreaking Gen AI solutions' and 'responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions'. It highlights end-to-end responsibility for these solutions, including building, testing, deploying, and running them, which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The mention of converting generic parts to reusable building blocks also suggests application development around GenAI, further supporting this classification.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build web applications autonomously from scratch' and 'Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks' indicates traditional software development activities to create user-facing applications and components.
job_tasks.phrase: Build web applications autonomously from scratch

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams' implies building software components that are integrated into larger systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions' directly points to the development and implementation of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions' encompasses the entire lifecycle of an AI solution in production, including deployment and operational aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities' suggests a focus on automating the deployment and operational processes, which is a key part of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work' implies collaboration within a team structure.
job_tasks.phrase: Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems' directly indicates collaborative problem-solving and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together' highlights the importance of collaboration and seeking input from others.
job_tasks.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together

soft_skills.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders
